example.eg: He regarded him as a hero.
She regards it as an exception to the rule.
example.egtrans: 她认为那是超出常规的。

example.eg: He regarded her movements with interest.
example.egtrans: 他饶有兴味地观察着她的举动。

example.eg: This letter regards your recent behaviour.
example.egtrans: 这封信涉及你最近的行为。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 关于, 涉及, 与…有关

example.eg: She is regarded very highly by her boss.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 器重, 看重, 敬重

example.eg: The doctor is liked and respected for the regard she shows for her patients' welfare.
example.egtrans: 因为对自己病人十分关爱，那位医生受到许多人的爱戴和尊敬。

example.eg: She is held in high regard.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尊敬, 尊重, 敬重
问候, 祝愿, 问好

dsense.name: regards
dsense.guideword: written (closing: letter, email, etc) (信件结尾)

example.eg: I have great regard for my parents' achievements.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 尊敬，尊重, 器重，看重, 注意，关注
对…非常器重, 对…很重视
在这方面, 在这点上

example.eg: The old professor was regarded with esteem by his fellow faculty members.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 关注自身利益, 自顾

dsense.name: with regard to, in regard to, with regards to

example.eg: I am writing to you with regard to your son's behaviour in class.
example.egtrans: 我给您写信，是想谈谈您儿子的课堂表现。

example.eg: He kept talking loudly on his cell phone without regard to the other theater patrons.
